text: Paratu jihare loka apani puji nu alaha di prasanata prapata karana la'i ate apane apa vica sathirata li'a'una la'i pure mana nala alaha de raha vica kharaca karade hana unham di misala ika baga vanga hai, jihara uca'i upara hove. Usa upara maul'hedhara minha pave tam usa nu cugana fala lage. Jekara zi'ada minha na pave tam halaki phuhara vi vadhi'a hai. Jo kujha tusim karade ho, alaha usa nu dekha riha hai
